title: Seeing gold in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Gold in a dream We do not see gold in a dream. Everything is fine and good, as many of those who see this vision in their dreams believe, but it can indicate many misfortunes that will befall the visionary. The interpretation of seeing gold in a dream by Ibn Sirin through the site is different. The interpretation of this vision was known to the scholar Ibn Sirin, so he interpreted it as follows Next: If one sees in a dream that he has found a treasure of pure gold, this vision indicates that this person will suffer a lot of anxiety, sadness, and grief, either because of a major financial loss or family problems that may lead to his separation. From his wife. While whoever sees in his dream that he has a piece of shiny gold with him and puts it in the fire until that golden piece melts, the interpretation of this vision indicates that something bad will happen to that person in the coming period from those around him. From it, whether in his work or in his place of residence. If a person sees that the walls of the house in which he lives are made of gold and he cannot enter his house, then this vision indicates that this person will suffer from a huge fire in his house and that the fire will consume the entire house. And the vision of searching for and hunting for gold The person who sees this vision will suffer from a serious illness and will suffer from it for a long time. Interpretation of gold in a dream by Ibn ShaheenIbn Shaheen explained the vision of gold in a dream in various ways as follows: Whoever sees in a dream that his eyes have turned into gold and shone from the intensity of the color of gold, this means that the dreamer He will suffer from eye disease and may lose his sight again. Seeing the same person eating on plates of pure gold and enjoying eating from them, but he does not feel full no matter what he eats, this vision indicates that this person is earning a lot of money from illegal and forbidden sources. It indicates Losing gold by a person in his dream indicates that this person will obtain a new source from which he will earn a good halal income after his problems in finding a job. And if the dreamer sees in a dream that someone gives him an amount of gold hidden in a black bag and no one sees it, then this vision shows that the dreamer He works in a certain position, but considers it permissible and takes bribes from people inside. In exchange for providing service to them. If a person sees in his dream that his feet and legs become golden whenever he wants to move and he cannot move, then this vision indicates that the person who has this vision whenever he commits a sin against God, he abhors this sin. From him and he did not commit it, and this is from God’s goodness to him. Read also: Interpretation of a dream of heavy rain for a single woman. Seeing gold in a dream about Nabulsi. Nabulsi interprets gold in a person’s dream as follows: If a man sees in his dream that he is giving a woman a gold ring, then this vision indicates that this person He will get married in a short time, but the marriage will not last long, as disagreements and quarrels will break out between them. To them. And seeing an unmarried young man in his dream that he gave his father a gold bracelet, this vision shows that this young man disobeyed his father and mother, but they often ask him for guidance to return to their righteousness as it was before. Al-Nabulsi also said in explaining the vision of gold in a dream. Whoever sees it in a dream That one

title: What is the interpretation of a recurring dream about someone who broke up with him?

preview.html: What is the interpretation of a recurring dream of someone who has separated from him? Interpreters explain that seeing someone in a dream despite the severance of relations is evidence that the two parties are still connected to each other, and this was reflected in the dream. Seeing the presence of someone whom you separated from in a dream indicates that the dreamer He feels homesick for this person, so he still appears in the dream. Seeing a person from the past in a dream shows that the dreamer wants to deal with this person, but there are some problems between them, but relations will improve. A dream that repeats the presence of a human being in a dream, that he is going through a crisis Big and wants help from the dreamer, so he came to him in the dream. Seeing the repeated presence of a person in a dream means that the dreamer will hear news related to this person during the coming period. Seeing the presence of a person with whom the relationship has ended means that the two parties want to tolerate each other, but there are those who hate them, Therefore, you should not listen to them around you and end disputes. Interpretation of a dream about someone you broke up with for a single woman. Seeing the presence of someone after a breakup in a single woman’s dream means that she still loves her ex-fiancé and needs to focus on her life. Seeing the presence of someone in a single woman’s dream Even though her relationship has ended, it means that she will receive happy news in the coming period. If an unmarried girl sees in a dream someone she knows and feels happy in the vision, this is a sign that her wedding date is approaching with someone she loves and who loves her. Seeing someone in a single woman’s dream is interpreted as striving She is behind a goal in life, but someone around her is trying to block her steps, so she needs to pay attention and focus on her path towards success. Seeing the presence of someone she broke up with in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates that she is trying to restore their relationship and must make the decision carefully so as not to... You fall into crises. Interpretation of a dream about a person with whom you broke up with a man. Seeing the presence of a person with whom my relationship ended in a man’s dream means that he is trying to get a new job and there are people who cause crises in his way and he must avoid them until he reaches his goals. Seeing someone in a dream appears after the breakup of relationships. That the man wants to restore his relationship with his ex-girlfriend, so this appeared in his dreams and he must think carefully before doing this act. Seeing someone in the man’s dream means that he is going through a major crisis in his life and he came to the dream and asked for help. Seeing the presence of someone indicates that despite The severance of relations in a man’s dream indicates that both parties want to engage with each other again and seeing him is good news. Interpretation of a dream about a person who broke up with a married woman. Scientists explain dreams and visions that the repeated presence of a person in a married woman’s dream indicates that she will meet him in the coming period. Seeing a woman Married in one’s presence in a dream means that the dreamer will hear happy news. If a married woman sees someone she knows in a dream and feels sad, this is a sign that the person is in distress and has come to her for help. Seeing the presence of someone the married woman does not know, and she feels fear in

title: Interpretation of seeing a bag of salt in a dream

preview.html: And the interpretation of seeing a bag of salt in a dream or a dream by Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, Ibn Shaheen, Ibn Katheer, and Imam Al-Sadiq. Scholars and jurists interpreted dreams and visions via a website.roy2a.com, as seeing salt in a dream has many interpretations and effects that we will discuss through this topic for a single girl and woman. A married woman, a pregnant woman, a man, a young man, and a divorced woman. What is the interpretation of seeing a bag of salt in a dream for a married woman: A married woman seeing a bag of salt in a dream is a sign of lawful money and enormous wealth. Seeing a pregnancy scattered in a bed or mattress is a sign to bring goodness and plenty of food. Seeing a woman A married woman giving salt to her husband is a sign of the approaching pregnancy and the arrival of happiness for them. See also: Interpretation of seeing enlarged breasts in a dream. What is the interpretation of a pregnant woman who sees salt in a dream: Seeing a pregnant woman with salt in a dream is one of the promising visions that shows a lot of goodness and food. Seeing a pregnant woman spreading salt in The dream is an indication of easy childbirth and the birth of a good, handsome boy. Seeing a woman holding table salt in a dream is an indication of her love and concern for her husband. Seeing a pregnant woman taking salt from her husband is a sign that God will respond to all her prayers and achieve what she wants. See also: Interpretation of seeing a white or red dress according to the color of the dream. What is the interpretation? Seeing salt in a dream for a single girl: A single girl seeing salt in a dream is a sign of her weakness and inability to make any decision in her life. Seeing in a dream an unmarried woman tasting table salt is a sign of her marriage to a stingy young man and people who hate him. Seeing a single girl putting salt on food indicates a confrontation. Some difficulties in her life. See also: Interpretation of seeing a bag of coffee in a dream What is the interpretation of seeing another person giving salt in a dream: Seeing yourself giving salt in a dream to another person indicates the strength of the relationship and love between them, with a lot of good that comes from this person. Seeing salt in The dream is an indication of the dreamer’s wealth. Dreaming of giving salt to others is an indication that he has received a large inheritance from a relative. See also: Interpretation of seeing a bag of rice in a dream. Interpretation of seeing salt on the body in a dream: Seeing salt on the body in a dream is a sign of fatigue and exhaustion, and for a woman it is a sign of her happy marriage. And her love for her husband. Seeing salt scattered in a dream is a message to think deeply about life’s problems and issues. Seeing him in a dream that he is spreading salt on others is a sign of recovery from diseases. What is the interpretation of seeing salt in a dream about Nabulsi: Seeing salt in a dream about Nabulsi will sign a lot of money without effort or hardship. Seeing salt in a dream about Nabulsi Al-Nabulsi in a dream indicates the end of disputes between enemies and the return of a strong relationship between them. Seeing rotten salt in a dream is a sign of the spread of ignorance and disease in society. See also: Interpretation of seeing a bag of clothes in a dream. Interpretation of salt in a dream according to Al-Osaimi: Seeing salt in a dream for Al-Osaimi is a sign of a lot of money without Any troubles. Seeing rotten salt in a dream indicates that the monarch is suffering great harm and harm from someone close to him. Seeing salt in a dream is a sign of a serious illness.

title: Interpretation of seeing cats in a dream for a married woman

preview.html: Cats are pets that many of us love, but what is the interpretation of seeing cats in a dream for a married woman and what does this indicate? Do you mean good or bad? Each of us has his own interpretation depending on our psychological, health and social situation, and the vision cannot be generalized to all people, so we will try to clarify some interpretations related to seeing cats in a dream in the following article via the encyclopedia.Interpretation of seeing cats in a dream for a married womanIf a married woman sees a cat in her dream and keeps it away from her And you do not want them, then this dream is an indication of the problems that she is going through in her life and that she is suffering from instability. But if you see cats, feeding them, and getting close to them, this is a sign of the goodness that exists in the home of this married woman, and the provision of many good things in her life. The married woman sees in Her dream of some cats fighting with each other is evidence of the problems she faces in her life and that there is a big problem in her home. If a married woman sees that cats are chasing her, this dream is a great indication of the presence of designers in her life and the presence of people trying to belittle her and indicates The presence of haters. If a married woman sees the eyes of a cat looking at her in a dream, this is a sign of envious eyes, and the more eyes the cat has on her, the more those who envy her. If a married woman sees a cat in a dream and it looks ugly, then this dream is a sign and symbol of her failure in her life Marriage.Interpretation of seeing a cat in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says that seeing a cat in a dream and being extremely afraid of it is evidence of fear of making important and fateful decisions in life. Seeing cats in a dream about a single girl and being afraid of her, this indicates that the girl is not happy in her life and that she She is afraid of her future life and that she is unhappy with her partner. Seeing a pregnant cat in a dream and being afraid of it is evidence of a woman’s fear of the stages of pregnancy and the exhaustion of childbirth. Ibn Sirin says: Seeing cats in a dream and being afraid of them is evidence of the betrayal of those around her, and that these people carry treachery and hatred, and The dreamer is cautious. Interpretation of seeing cats in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi. Imam Al-Nabulsi says that seeing a male cat in a dream indicates the presence of treachery and treachery around him, and if the cat is female, this indicates kindness and happiness, and it also indicates that the dreamer is one of the people who loves money. Vision A man in a dream A kitten means success in life and success. But if a woman sees a kitten in a dream, this indicates that the dreamer is pregnant. Seeing a white cat in a dream is evidence that the dreamer is looking for love and security in the people around him. Seeing a black cat in a dream It is annoying and indicates bad luck in life. Seeing someone killing a black cat was a sign of good things, just as a black cat indicates bad luck and killing it is a sign of getting rid of bad things. Interpretation of seeing a cat in a dream by Ibn Shaheen Ibn Sirin believes that seeing a cat in a dream Evidence of treachery and treachery, and seeing a cat in a dream is praiseworthy.Seeing a cat

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about a gift of gold to unmarried women according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: What is Ibn Sirin’s opinion on the interpretation of a dream about a gift of gold for an unmarried woman? Interpretation of a dream about a gift of gold for a single woman in a dream. Does this scene carry a vision of good tidings? How did interpreters interpret this vision? Does the interpretation of the dream differ depending on the type of gift? In this article you will find the exact answers to these questions, follow the following.You have a dream that confuses you. You are waiting for it.. Google is an Egyptian site for interpreting dreams. Interpretation of dreams for a gift of gold for a single woman. A gift of gold in a dream for an unmarried woman means goodness, especially if she sees a dead person giving her this gift and looking at it. And he smiles. If in reality her manager gave her a lot of shiny golden pounds, then the dream indicates a gift that she will receive from him or that she will receive a reward that represents a lot of money and perhaps give her a big promotion that will increase her professional value and help her achieve her professional goals. When she gets a golden gift from Someone you know, but the color of the gold was black and its shape was very bad, may receive a marriage proposal from an inappropriate person because of his bad morals and ugliness of character. If an unmarried woman dreams of a stranger who gave her a gift of gold that resembles a treasure, or in a clearer sense, she sees that this The person gave her a box filled with many pieces of gold of various types and shapes, then this is wealth that she enjoys and her professional projects will succeed and bring many profits from them. Interpretation of a dream about a gift of gold for an unmarried woman by Ibn Sirin. The symbol of gold is not a harbinger for Ibn Sirin, it interprets worries, and if the dreamer sees That the color of gold is very yellow (i.e. it was very yellow), then these are serious sorrows and illnesses that will afflict him, and he may suffer from envy and resentment from others. And if someone in a dream gives her a gift of a gold bullion, then she will be sad that she will soon lose a lot of money. And if she dreams that a gold bullion If the gold that someone gave to her as a gift was very heavy, the dream means serious problems that the dreamer cannot bear in the near future, and the dream may indicate countless responsibilities that will burden the dreamer, and he or she will feel a lot of pressure and sadness because of them. The most important interpretations of a dream about a gift of gold For single women: Interpretation of dreams about a gift of a golden earring for a single woman: When a girl receives a gift from a stranger, it is beautiful and long earrings, but not heavy, and the dreamer wore them and was happy with them. When she enters a job, this dream warns her that she is about to enter into a business full of money and abundant profits. However, if she took an earring from someone in a dream against her will, she may be forced into a forced marriage in reality, and if she dreamed that she took an earring as a gift from someone, but the earring did not It was made of gold, and this person lied to her and deceived her in the dream. The dream warns her that the cunning young man could make false promises to her, so she must be careful in the coming days. Interpretation of a dream about a gift of a gold ring for single people. It is known in the interpretation books that golden rings indicate Prestige, money and power, and when the dreamer receives a beautiful golden ring from a young man whom she does not know, this indicates his marriage

Interpretation of a dream of a gift of gold for an unmarried woman by Ibn Sirin The symbol of gold is not a harbinger of Ibn Sirin Sirin, it interprets worries, and if the dreamer sees that the color of the gold is very yellow (i.e. it was very yellow), then these are sorrows and serious illnesses that afflict him, and he may suffer from envy and resentment from others. And if someone gives her in a dream a gift of a gold bar, then she will be sad that she will lose a lot of money soon. And if she dreams that the gold bar that someone gave her as a gift was very heavy, then the dream means serious problems that the dreamer cannot bear in the near future, and the dream may indicate countless responsibilities that will burden the dreamer, and he will feel a lot of pressure and sadness because of them. The most important interpretations of the dream of a gift of gold for singles Interpretation of dreams of a gift of a gold earring for a single woman When a girl receives a gift from a stranger, they are beautiful and long earrings, but they are not heavy, and the dreamer wore them and was happy with them. When she enters a job, this dream warns her that she is about to enter a business full of money and abundant profits. However, if she takes the earring from someone in a dream against her will, she may be forced to marry in reality, and if she dreams that she took the earring as a gift from someone, but the earring was not made of gold, and this person lied to her and deceived her in the dream, the dream warns her that the cunning young man can make her false promises, so she must be careful in the coming days. Interpretation of a dream about a gift of a gold ring for singles It is known in the books of interpretation that gold rings indicate prestige, money and power, and when the dreamer receives a beautiful gold ring from a young man she does not know, this indicates his marriage

title: What is Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing children in an unmarried woman’s dream?

preview.html: Seeing children in a dream for single people: The secret of happiness in life lies in the presence of children in it. Their play and laughter make us forget every worry in our lives and we find that every girl dreams of motherhood since childhood, but what about seeing children in a dream for single women? It is as good as reality, or there are other concepts. We will find the answer in detail in this article. What is the interpretation of seeing children in a dream for a single woman? Vision Children in a dream indicate that they live in tremendous and unlimited prosperity and that their lives will change to become more spacious in earning livelihood and money. We find that the matter becomes much better if the children are neat and clean. Their cleanliness is evidence that they will not live a difficult day, but rather that their life will be free of worries. And worries. Their laughter is an expression of the happiness and joy that fills her life. Everything she thinks about will find it before her eyes, so she will not be sad anymore. It also indicates that she will be surprised by wonderful news that he gives her. She has her renewed hope in life, such as: a promotion at work or a trip to study. If she sees it in her dream but does not feel joy and happiness, this indicates the extent of the responsibility that falls on her and that she will not be able to bear it for a longer period, so she asks the mother for help. Or a father or brother to relieve her from the pressures of life. Seeing male children causes anxiety, but if they look beautiful, the vision indicates the benefit and goodness that the girl will find in her life. As for seeing female children in her dream, it gives the dream a comfortable and beautiful character, as The girl succeeds in achieving her maximum goals without any disappointment. Some undesirable signs in this dream: Appearing with dirty clothes in a dream means that she will hear bad news that will disturb her for a while, but if she cleans their clothes in a dream, her condition will improve than before. Children crying in a dream An undesirable sign that indicates the emergence of many problems in life with her family or work without the ability to control them properly. If she is disgusted by their appearance in the dream, this leads to financial crises that may lead her to poverty and debt. If she is patient, her Lord will reward her with goodness in Her life and her afterlife. Her fear and anxiety from them also indicate that she was forced into some situations that do not make her happy and she believes that she will not be able to adapt to them no matter what, such as a study that she does not like, or a relationship with a person that she does not like. Seeing children in a dream for individuals according to Ibn SirinSeeing children In Ibn Sirin’s dream, Imam Ibn Sirin explained to us many meanings in seeing children and explained that if they are in an organized body, it confirms a life in bliss and happiness, free of distress and anxiety. The dream is also an important sign that she will find joy that she did not expect in the coming period that will change her life for the better. (God willing), whether through a happy marriage, or through success and excellence. Organizing their clothes in a dream indicates that she got rid of all the problems that were threatening her life and was able to find the right paths in her life without stress or hardship. Selling children in a dream is not considered A vision worthy of praise because it leads to many

title: Interpretation of dreams for my ex-husband asking me for food in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams of my ex-husband asking me for food in a dream, you can find out what he conveys.Dream interpretation of my ex-husband asking me for food in a dreamDream interpretation of my ex-husband asking me for food in a dream. It may be a sign of repentance, and God knows best. If a divorced woman sees her ex-husband begging her for food, then his ex-wife may regret leaving her, and God knows the unseen. When a dream skips a divorced man’s request for food from his ex-wife, this could be a sign of her husband’s deep remorse, and God knows all. What is not seen. Interpretation of a dream about my ex-wife asking to return in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about my ex-wife asking to return in a dream, it could be a sign of his return to his ex-wife. If the dreamer sees his ex-wife asking to return while crying, this may lead to solving problems, and God is Great and All-Knowing. If the dreamer sees that He refuses his ex-wife’s request to return in a dream, as this may lead to cruelty, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about my ex-wife who gave me gold in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about my ex-wife who gave me gold in a dream. We did not find any specific explanations for seeing this. However, seeing my ex-wife giving me gold in a dream could be a sign of understanding and harmony, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. If a divorced woman sees her ex-husband giving me gold, it may lead to marriage or her returning to his ex-wife, God knows the unseen. If a divorced woman sees her ex-husband giving her a gold ring in a dream, this may be a sign of kindness, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about my ex-wife wearing a ring in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about my ex-wife wearing a golden ring in a dream. We did not find any specific explanations for seeing this, except that seeing my ex-husband in a dream may be a sign that I am thinking and regretting divorcing her, and God knows the unseen. If a divorced woman sees her ex-wife in a dream, this may be evidence of her desire to return to her ex-wife, and God knows the unseen. If A divorced woman saw her ex-husband wearing a ring in a dream. This may be a sign of good news, God willing. Interpretation of dreams about a black inscription for a divorced woman in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a black inscription for a divorced woman in a dream could be a sign of kindness, God willing, as seeing a black inscription for a divorced woman may indicate Happiness, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. If a divorced woman sees a black pattern, it may indicate the Gulf, and God knows the unseen. If a divorced woman sees a black pattern in a dream, then she can express the satisfaction of a need and the achievement of goals, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about my ex-husband longing for me in a dream. Interpretation of dreams for my ex-husband I miss him in a dream. We did not find interpretations Specific to see thatHowever, seeing my ex-husband hugging me in a dream could be a sign of their return, God willing, as a man’s chest with his ex-wife may indicate solving problems, and God knows the unseen. If a man sees his ex-wife’s arms in a dream, this may be evidence of his remorse and thinking about Return, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about my ex-wife

title: Interpretation of a dream about turnips by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing turnips in a dream for a single woman, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman, for a man. White and red turnip pickles, beet pickles by Ibn Sirin, Imam al-Sadiq and others. Interpretation of turnips in a dreamAbdul Ghani al-Nabulsi reported that seeing turnips in a dream symbolizes a village woman, and seeing turnips in the house means children, especially males, as well as turnips in a dream and its presence in the house. Can it indicate Familiarity and love between family members, and seeing turnips in general is something worthy of praise in a dream as long as it does not wither or rot. Turnips: denotes a rural woman, and turnips are familiarity. Visions of turnips are interpreted as sadness and sorrow, and eating them is more beneficial. Interpretation of turnips in a dream is that it is the literal meaning of the beginning, and in general, seeing leafy greens. In a dream, it is a praiseworthy vision, as long as its color is green and fresh, not withered or yellow, and seeing buying turnips in a girl’s dream is a sign of profit, benefit and money, and an unmarried girl who eats turnip greens in the winter is a sign of love, tenderness, and kindness.. The state of celibacy and guidance. For her in her professional life. As for the dream of drinking soaked turnips, it is food, and seeing pickled turnips is something worthy of praise, as long as its color does not tend to yellow, because it indicates thrift, and a single woman who eats pickled turnips means something that she accepts will return. With kindness and blessing to them, it may indicate marriage, work, or travel. Interpretation of turnips in a dream for a married woman. A married woman’s vision of turnips in her dream is an indication and good news, whether it is livelihood related to money or livelihood related to children, whether it is close to pregnancy, and seeing boiled turnips Or salted or pickled is a sign of money. And seeing her cutting a turnip in a married woman’s dream is an indication of the goodness and benefit that will arise for the married woman in something he does, otherwise it portends his flock or great strife and separation, and seeing a soaked turnip indicates current money and blessings in her home and family. Interpretation of a turnip in a pregnant woman’s dream. As for seeing a turnip in a dream For a pregnant woman, seeing it in general is evidence of its nourishment and blessing, and good health tidings for the pregnant woman and the fetus. Interpretation of turnips in a man’s dream. Regarding the interpretation of seeing turnips in a man’s dream, it is a symbol of self-confidence and a sign of good luck in money or work, and seeing him eating fresh turnips is It is a sign of a man’s haste in making decisions and a message to be careful in his affairs. Whether he eats boiled or cooked turnips or pickles, this indicates praiseworthy judgments. Seeing a man who grows turnips in a dream indicates the fulfillment of the dreamer’s ambitions and the fulfillment of his goals and desires. Seeing turnips being picked or harvested, then selling them and getting their price is a sign of halal money.

title: Interpretation of a dream about washing dishes in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about washing dishes in a dream, dear reader, you can find out what the dream interpretation about washing dishes in a dream brings, according to what scholars and interpreters have stated, not personal interpretations..Interpretation of a dream about washing dishes in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about washing dishes in a dream can be evidence of Purity, and God knows the unseen. When you see a single girl washing dishes in a dream, this could be evidence of cleanliness and purity, and God knows the unseen. If a married woman sees herself washing the dishes, this could be evidence of good changes, and God knows the unseen. Also, seeing washing dishes in a dream could mean that it is possible. That it leads to the satisfaction of desires, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about washing clothes with milk in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about washing clothes with milk in a dream. Washing with milk can indicate getting rid of sins, and God knows the unseen. And if a married woman sees herself washing with milk, then she may avoid mistakenly. And God knows best. If a divorced woman sees herself washing With milk, this may be a sign that she is far from committing sins and that God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about washing the vagina with milk in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about washing the vagina with milk in a dream We did not find clear meanings that scholars see, except that seeing a milk bath can lead to goodness, and God knows best. Washing with milk means getting rid of Of sins and transgressions, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. When you dream of washing yourself with milk, this may be a sign of abandoning sins, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about washing feet with milk in a dream Interpretation of a dream about washing feet with milk in a dream could be a sign of kindness, as walking on the straight path may suggest, for God is also All-Knowing. A young man saw himself in a dream washing his feet with milk, this may mean that he is getting rid of problems, and God knows the unseen. When you see an unmarried girl, washing your feet with milk in a dream could mean that you will get rid of sins, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about washing the feet of a deceased person in a dream. Interpretation of a dream Washing the feet of a dead person in a dream could be evidence of his need for charity, and God knows the unseen. If a married woman sees herself washing the feet of a dead person in a dream, this may indicate the need for begging and charity, and God knows best. If a married man is seen washing the feet of a dead person, this may lead to need. The dead to supplication, and God knows the unseen. If a young man sees himself in a dream washing the feet of the dead, he may express his need to beg and seek forgiveness, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of the dream of washing hair with milk in a dream. Interpretation of the dream of washing hair with milk in a dream may indicate that you will find a job, and God knows the unseen. When an unmarried girl sees herself washing her hair with milk in a dream, this may be evidence that she will get a job, and God knows best. If a married man is seen washing his hair with milk, this may be a sign of comfort, and God knows the unseen. When an unmarried girl sees herself washing her hair With milk in a dream, this may express rest after fatigue, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about washing

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a cactus in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Seeing cactus in a dream in abundance interprets the good news and good changes that the dreamer will undergo by God’s command, just as the cactus plant in a dream of debt is the repayment of the debt and the healing of the sick. Whereas touching the thorns of a cactus in a dream is a great experience and anguish that the dreamer has commanded by God, in the dream of a married woman, the cactus shows many problems and differences that exist with her husband and will soon be removed, and in the dream of an unmarried woman, the cactus indicates the fears and harm of friends. A man and a woman dream in detail. Interpretation of seeing a cactus plant in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin says that seeing a cactus in a dream indicates happy and good news in the life of the person who had this vision. If the dreamer is in debt and sees a cactus plant in a dream, then this vision indicates that his debt will bear fruit. Soon, God willing. It is also said that seeing a cactus in a dream indicates turmoil, problems, and fears around the vision. If the dreamer sees that he is eating from a cactus plant, then this vision shows the strength of the faith of the one who has this vision and his good performance in obedience and worship. Interpretation of a dream about a cactus for a single woman indicates a cactus In a dream for a single girl, it indicates that he will soon be linked to her. A cactus in a dream for an unmarried girl is an indication of happy news and goals. If a girl holds a cactus in her hand, this indicates committing sins and transgressions. Eating a cactus in a dream can be an indication of her righteousness. It can Removing cactus thorns from the hand of an unmarried girl is a sign of getting rid of fears and problems. Interpretation of a dream about a cactus for a married woman: Cactus thorns in a married woman’s dream may indicate marital differences. Removing cactus thorns from a married woman’s hand can indicate the end of all marital disputes. It can indicate Removing the spine of a cactus to the evil eye and envy. Interpretation of a dream about a cactus for a pregnant woman. Many dream scholars also explained that they saw a woman pregnant with a cactus plant suffering from extreme exhaustion and pain during pregnancy and childbirth. A cactus plant in a dream is approaching childbirth, and perhaps a woman touching a soft cactus in a dream portends With a child of good character and religion and free of all evil. If a pregnant woman sees cactus thorns stuck to her in her dream, the vision indicates difficulty in childbirth, fear and anxiety about the future. A husband’s gift to his wife, a cactus in a dream, is a strong love and a good relationship that brings them together, and the vision can indicate To get rid of problems and fears with the husband. Interpretation of a dream about a cactus for a man: When a man sees a cactus in a dream, this is a sign of his freedom from fears and all the problems he is going through. If a man is affected by the thorns of a cactus, this is a sign of the sorrows that he will feel in the coming period. The presence of a cactus indicates In the house to the death of a family member. Eating sour cactus in a dream is a sign of troubles and troubles. Seeing a cactus tree in a dream can be evidence that the dreamer is a kind-hearted person. Interpretation of a dream about a cactus in a married and single dream A married man can see a lot of Prickly cactus f

Interpretation of a dream about a cactus for a pregnant woman. Many dream scholars also explained that they saw a woman pregnant with a cactus plant suffering from extreme exhaustion and pain during pregnancy and childbirth. A cactus plant in a dream is approaching childbirth, and perhaps a woman touching a soft cactus in a dream portends With a child of good character and religion and free of all evil. If a pregnant woman sees cactus thorns stuck to her in her dream, the vision indicates difficulty in childbirth, fear and anxiety about the future. A husband’s gift to his wife, a cactus in a dream, is a strong love and a good relationship that brings them together, and the vision can indicate To get rid of problems and fears with the husband. Interpretation of a dream about a cactus for a man: When a man sees a cactus in a dream, this is a sign of his freedom from fears and all the problems he is going through. If a man is affected by the thorns of a cactus, this is a sign of the sorrows that he will feel in the coming period. The presence of a cactus indicates In the house to the death of a family member. Eating sour cactus in a dream is a sign of troubles and troubles. Seeing a cactus tree in a dream can be evidence that the dreamer is a kind-hearted person.
